question: Which Ethernet standard operates at 10 Mbps over thick coaxial cable with a maximum segment length of 500 meters?

Which Fast Ethernet standard uses four pairs of Cat3 copper cabling to reach 100 Mbps?
Which Fast Ethernet standard uses two pairs of twisted-pair copper and supports full-duplex operation?

Which Gigabit Ethernet standard operates at 1 Gbps over single-mode fiber using long-wavelength lasers?
